intro.title: What is Biokinetics?
intro.text: Biokinetics is the science of movement and the application of exercise in rehabilitative treatment or performance enhancement. It's about improving physical functioning and quality of life through individualized scientific assessment and the prescription of exercise.
benefits: Reduced risk of injury and faster recovery.
Better overall physical and mental wellness.

team.name: Nicole
team.bio: Nicole is a passionate biokineticist with a special interest in orthopaedic rehabilitation and chronic disease management. She believes in a holistic approach to health, empowering her patients to take control of their well-being through movement.

team.name: Jhana
team.bio: Jhana focuses on high-performance training and sports science. With a background in competitive sports, she is dedicated to helping athletes of all levels reach their peak potential, prevent injuries, and achieve their performance goals.
